languages.text: "Превыше любых ожиданий! Мы... признаться, не смели надеяться. Дозволение поселиться на Даргонусе и продолжить службу на столичном мире династии уже было великой милостью от Леди Теодоры, и мы не ждали большего внимания". {n}Ксиони мягко улыбается, но пальцы ее крутят фамильный кулон.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Предвосхищает любые ожидания! Мы... признаться, мы не ожидали приглашения. Ибо впервые с тех пор как Ее Светлость Леди Теодора милостиво даровала нам титулы и место на Даргонусе, с нами связался кто-то из представителей династии". {n}Ксиони Эрэбис мягко улыбается, но пальцы ее не перестают покручивать фамильный кулон.{/n}

languages.text: "It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Превыше любых ожиданий! Мы... признаться, не смели надеяться. Дозволение поселиться на Даргонусе и продолжить службу на столичном мире династии уже было великой милостью от Леди Теодоры, и мы не ждали большего внимания". {n}Ксиони мягко улыбается, но пальцы ее крутят фамильный кулон.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beyond all expectations! We... could not dream of something like this, to be honest. The permission to retire was in itself a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part, and we did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with the family-heirloom pendant.{/n}

"Beyond all expectations! We... could not dream of something like this, to be honest. The permission to retire was in itself a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part, and we did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with the family-heirloom pendant.{/n}

"It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamed of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to retire was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part, and we did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with the heirloom pendant.{/n}

"It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamed of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to retire was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part, and we did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with the heirloom pendant.{/n}

"It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}

"It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}

languages.text: « Cela dépasse toutes nos attentes ! Pour tout vous avouer, nous n'aurions pas pu rêver mieux. Dame Théodora s'était montrée extrêmement généreuse en nous accordant la permission de nous installer sur Dargonus et de continuer à servir sur le monde-capital de la dynastie. Nous ne nous attendions pas à recevoir d'autres faveurs. » {n}Xioni sourit avec douceur tout en triturant nerveusement son pendentif.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cela dépasse toutes nos attentes ! Pour tout vous avouer, nous n'aurions pas pu rêver mieux. Considérant que nous avions déjà reçu la permission de nous retirer de la part de dame Théodora, nous ne nous attendions pas à recevoir d'autres faveurs, et certainement pas de cette ampleur. » {n}Xioni sourit avec douceur tout en triturant nerveusement son pendentif.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Supera todas nuestras expectativas! Sinceramente, no... nunca podríamos haber imaginado algo como esto. El permiso para establecernos en Dargonus y seguir prestando servicio en el mundo capital de la dinastía ya fue un gesto sumamente generoso por parte de lady Theodora. Desde luego no esperábamos más atenciones». {n}Xioni sonríe amablemente, aunque no deja de gesticular con su colgante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Supera todas nuestras expectativas! Sinceramente, no... nunca podríamos haber imaginado algo como esto. El permiso para retirarnos ya fue un gesto sumamente generoso por parte de lady Theodora, y desde luego no esperábamos más atenciones». {n}Xioni sonríe amablemente, aunque no deja de gesticular con su colgante.{/n}

languages.text: 「まさかこのようなことが…！正直に申しまして…こんな状況は夢にも思ってもおりませんでした。ダルゴナスに定住し、王朝の首都惑星で奉仕を続ける許可をいただけるだけでも、シオドーラ様の寛大なお心遣いでした」{n}シオニは穏やかな微笑みを浮かべているが、指は家宝のペンダントをそわそわと触っている。 {/n}
languages.original_text: "It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まさかこのようなことが…！正直に申しまして…こんな状況は夢にも思っていませんでした。シオドーラ様に引退を許可いただいたことも、とてつもなくありがたいことでしたのに、また気にかけていただけるとは思いもしませんでしたわ」{n}シオニは穏やかな微笑みを浮かべているが、指は家宝のペンダントをそわそわと触っている。 {/n}

languages.text: “这简直是让我们受宠若惊！我们……老实说，我们做梦也想象不到能受到您的邀请。西奥多拉夫人仅仅是允许我们在达戈努斯定居，在首都世界继续为王朝服务，这对我们而言就已经是莫大的荣耀了。我们从没指望过会得到更多关注。”{n}肖妮温柔地笑了起来，但她的手指却在摆弄她的家族吊坠。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这简直是让我们受宠若惊！我们……老实说，我们做梦也想象不到能受到邀请。我们侍奉西奥多拉夫人的时候，哪怕她仅仅是亲口对我们说声‘解散’，那对我们来说也是莫大的荣耀。我们从来没指望过得到更多关注。”{n}肖妮温柔地笑了起来，但她的手指却在摆弄她的家族吊坠。{/n}

languages.text: "Das übertrifft alle unsere Erwartungen! Wir ... hätten uns etwas Derartiges nicht zu erträumen gewagt. Allein die Erlaubnis, auf Dargonus zu siedeln und der Dynastie auf der Hauptwelt weiter zu dienen, war eine überaus großzügige Geste von Lady Theodora. Wir hatten keine weitere Aufmerksamkeit erwartet." {n}Xioni lächelt freundlich, aber ihre Finger spielen mit dem Erbstück um ihren Hals.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es übertrifft sämtliche Erwartungen! Wir ... hätten uns so etwas niemals auch nur erträumt, ganz ehrlich. Schon die Erlaubnis für den Ruhestand war eine überaus großzügige Geste von Lady Theodora, und wir hatten nicht mit weiteren Zuwendungen gerechnet." {n}Xioni lächelt sanft, aber ihre Finger spielen nervös an ihrem Erbanhänger herum.{/n}

languages.text: "Tüm beklentilerimizin de ötesinde! Dürüst olmak gerekirse... Böylesine bir şeyi hayal dahi edemezdik. Dargonus'a yerleşip hanedanlığın başdünyasında hizmetimizi sürdürmemize müsaade edilmesi bile Leydi Theodora'nın bugüne kadarki en ince jesti olmuştu. Daha fazla nezaket göstermenizi beklemiyorduk." {n}Xioni nazikçe gülümsese de parmakları, aile yadigârı kolye üzerinde geziniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is beyond all our expectations! We... could not have dreamt of something like this, to be honest. Even just permission to settle on Dargonus and continue our service on the dynasty's capital world was a most gracious gesture on Lady Theodora's part. We did not expect any further attention." {n}Xioni smiles gently, but her fingers are fidgeting with her heirloom pendant.{/n}
